languages.text: "Священный мир-кузня всегда был закрыт для посещения мирянами. Думаю, лишь угроза полного его осквернения Губительными силами заставила Эксплораторов смириться, что их профанные союзники вообще высадились на поверхность благословенного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Это священный мир-кузня, где находятся мануфакторумы Адептус Механикус. Он всегда был закрыт для посещения, и лишь угроза захвата его Губительными Силами заставила Эксплораторов позволить мирянам-союзникам ступить на его поверхность".

languages.text: "This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."
languages.original_text: "Священный мир-кузня всегда был закрыт для посещения мирянами. Думаю, лишь угроза полного его осквернения Губительными силами заставила Эксплораторов смириться, что их профанные союзники вообще высадились на поверхность благословенного мира".

traits.locale_text: "This is a sacred forge world housing manufactorums of the Adeptus Mechanicus. It had always been closed off to the laypeople, and only the threat of losing it to the Ruinous Powers convinced the Explorators to resign themselves to the fact their profane allies set foot on the surface of the blessed world."

"This is a sacred forge world housing manufactorums of the Adeptus Mechanicus. It had always been closed off to the laypeople, and only the threat of losing it to the Ruinous Powers convinced the Explorators to resign themselves to the fact their profane allies set foot on the surface of the blessed world."

"This sacred Forge World had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

"This sacred Forge World had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

"This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

languages.text: “这个神圣的铸造世界始终禁止一切教外人士进入。我相信，只有当它处于严重的威胁之下，可能会被毁灭之力彻底腐化时，那群开拓者才会不情不愿地允许那些亵渎的盟友踏足他们神圣的世界。”
languages.original_text: "This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

traits.locale_text: “这个神圣的铸造世界始终禁止一切教外人士进入。我相信，只有当它处于严重的威胁之下，可能会被毁灭之力彻底腐化时，那群开拓者才会不情不愿地允许那些亵渎的盟友踏足他们神圣的世界。”

languages.text: « Depuis toujours, ce monde forge sacré est interdit aux non-initiés. Je crois que c'est uniquement sous la menace de le voir totalement corrompu par les Puissances de la Ruine que les Explorators ont accepté à contrecœur de laisser leurs alliés profanes poser le pied sur leur monde sanctifié. »
languages.original_text: "This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis toujours, ce monde forge sacré est interdit aux non-initiés. Je crois que c'est uniquement sous la menace de le voir totalement corrompu par les Puissances de la Ruine que les Explorators ont accepté à contrecœur de laisser leurs alliés profanes poser le pied sur leur monde sanctifié. »

languages.text: "Es war normalen Sterblichen immer verboten, diese heilige Fabrikwelt zu betreten. Ich glaube, da die Exploratoren befürchteten, dass die Welt von den Mächten der Zerstörung völlig korrumpiert wird, und so mussten sie widerwillig in Kauf nehmen, ihren gottlosen Verbündeten Zutritt zu ihrer gesegneten Welt zu gewähren."
languages.original_text: "This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

traits.locale_text: "Es war normalen Sterblichen immer verboten, diese heilige Fabrikwelt zu betreten. Ich glaube, da die Exploratoren befürchteten, dass die Welt von den Mächten der Zerstörung völlig korrumpiert wird, und so mussten sie widerwillig in Kauf nehmen, ihren gottlosen Verbündeten Zutritt zu ihrer gesegneten Welt zu gewähren."

languages.text: «A los laicos nunca se les ha permitido la entrada a este sagrado mundo forja. Creo que los Exploradores, al prever la corrupción que podían ocasionar los poderes ruinosos, aceptaron a regañadientes que sus aliados profanos pusieran un pie en su mundo».
languages.original_text: "This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

traits.locale_text: «A los laicos nunca se les ha permitido la entrada a este sagrado mundo forja. Creo que los Exploradores, al prever la corrupción que podían ocasionar los poderes ruinosos, aceptaron a regañadientes que sus aliados profanos pusieran un pie en su mundo».

languages.text: 「この神聖な工業惑星は常に一般人には閉ざされていた。禍つ神々によって完全に破壊される恐れがあったからこそ、探検家たちは不純な盟友が自分たちの祝福された世界に足を踏み入れることを渋々受け入れたのだと思う」
languages.original_text: "This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."

traits.locale_text: 「この神聖な工業惑星は常に一般人には閉ざされていた。禍つ神々によって完全に破壊される恐れがあったからこそ、探検家たちは不純な盟友が自分たちの祝福された世界に足を踏み入れることを渋々受け入れたのだと思う」

languages.text: "Bu kutsal döküm dünyası, ezelden beri avama kapalı kalmıştır. Zannımca Keşiftörler, ancak Yıkıcı Güçler'in yozlaşma tehdidiyle karşılaşınca kutsal tanımaz müttefiklerinin mukaddes topraklarına ayak basmalarına göz yummuşlardı."
languages.original_text: "This sacred forge world had always been closed off to the laypeople. I believe that it was only at the threat of having it utterly corrupted by the Ruinous Powers, that the Explorators had begrudgingly accepted their profane allies setting foot in their blessed world."
